data.title: Darren Long - 2019-20 - Men's Basketball

data.text:
UC Santa Barbara

2019-20

â€¢ Darren Long played briefly in two games.

High School

Darren Long played at Harvard-Westlake School...Suffered a broken ankle his senior season and was limited to a handful of games...Averaged 2.0 points and 2.0 rebounds during his junior season...As a sophomore, Long averaged 15 points, 4 rebounds, 4 assists and 2 steals per game...Scored a career-high 20 points in one game as a sophomore, making five three-point baskets...Was named his team's top defensive player and Freshman MVP...Helped the program to the Mission League title...Also helped his team to the CIF playoffs twice and the State Playoffs once...Played for David Rebibo at Harvard-Westlake School.
